movies.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
movies.overview: Detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett are back for another explosive adventure as they uncover corruption within the Miami PD.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.overview: A retired hitman seeks vengeance for the death of his beloved dog, unleashing a relentless rampage against the Russian mob.

movies.title: Inception
movies.overview: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully plant an idea into a target's subconscious.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.overview: Batman faces his greatest psychological and physical tests when the Joker unleashes chaos on Gotham City.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.overview: The Avengers assemble for a final showdown against Thanos to restore balance to the universe.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.overview: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.overview: A computer hacker discovers the world he lives in is a simulated reality and joins a rebellion against its controllers.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.overview: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.overview: A group of visitors struggle to survive when cloned dinosaurs escape containment on a remote island theme park.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.overview: A young couple from different social classes fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.
